name: Acidflux
description:
This is yet another pure HTML5, CSS, JS game. If you look inside the archive, you will see the credits.

Controls: Swipe left and right on mobile or use the A and D keys.

I lost connection during the timelapse, but I will piece it together and upload it. Hopefully you can see how hard it was to make this; something we all take for granted is having fully functional game engines and IDEs.
